overview: Co-hosts Alexis Linkletter and Billy Jensen return for Unraveled: The Stalker's Web to track the multi-decade wrath of one of the most prolific stalkers to ever prowl the cyberworld. Compiling upwards of fifty victims, this online predator unleashed vicious attacks that cost people their livelihoods, destroyed their marriages, and drove some toward suicide. And when he can target anyone, anywhereâ€”who will he come for next? Alexis Linkletter and Billy Jensen investigate his trail of destruction to unmask this deadly threat.
title: Unraveled: The Stalker's Web
